Identification.ShortTitle: Quebec Family Allowances Income Tax Remission Order, 1992
Identification.LongTitle: Order Respecting the Remission of Income Tax Payable in Respect of Quebec Family Allowances for 1992

Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, considering that it is in the public interest to do so, on the recommendation of the Minister of Finance, pursuant to subsection 23(2)* of the Financial Administration Act, is pleased hereby to make the annexed Order respecting the remission of income tax payable in respect of Quebec family allowances for 1992.

Section.Text: This Order may be cited as the Quebec Family Allowances Income Tax Remission Order, 1992.
In this Order, Act means the Income Tax Act. (Loi)

Remission of income tax is hereby granted, to every individual who received family allowances in 1992 under An Act Respecting Family Assistance Allowances of the Province of Quebec, of an amount equal to the aggregate of

Clause.Label: (A)
Clause.Text: the total amount of taxes, interest and penalties payable by the individual under Parts I, I.1 and I.2 of the Act for the 1992 taxation year

Clause.Label: (B)
Clause.Text: the amount, if any, deemed under subsection 120(2) of the Act to have been paid by the individual on account of the individual’s tax under Part I of the Act for the 1992 taxation year

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the excess amount that would be determined under subparagraph (i) for the 1992 taxation year if no amount were included in computing the individual’s income for that year with respect to family allowances received under An Act Respecting Family Assistance Allowances of the Province of Quebec in that year, and

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the total of all amounts, each of which is an amount that would be deemed under subsections 122.2(1) or 122.5(3) of the Act to have been paid by the individual on account of the individual’s tax under Part I of the Act for the 1992 taxation year, if no amount were included in computing the individual’s income for that year with respect to family allowances received under An Act Respecting Family Assistance Allowances of the Province of Quebec in that year

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the total of all amounts, each of which is an amount deemed under subsections 122.2(1) or 122.5(3) of the Act to have been paid by the individual on account of the individual’s tax under Part I of the Act for the 1992 taxation year.
